body:
Hi this is a disscousion about the CTH, I loved it so much but there is the problem.
Golden Swords? Seriously its the same! but i know, How about add unbreaking or unbreakable in commands.
If you wanna know how to get it here it is.   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gr5laJi8X04  For sword its always gold, add unbreaking or unbreakable please!     This is just an idea for CTH.         
 _________________________________________________________________________________________________ 
Pryomancer:  This was replace to Mage but no fireball staff???
Armour:   Leather cap,            Golden Chestplate,                Leather Pants, Golden Boots
                 (None)        (Projectile Protection 1,Unbreaking 3)   (None)            (None)

 Weapon:   It shouldn't been the same as Mage, for example shooting fireball. But it was replaced in to Fire Aspect.       
        Blaze Rod,  Stone Sword,  Splash Potion of Healing(16)
(Shoots Fireball)   
 
Effect: Jump Boost 2 
__________________________________________________________________________________________________

Lumberjack: Remove that :/ 
 ________________________________________________________________________________________________
 Assassion: This kit got nothing but splash why!? Changed this into Scout intead

 Armour: Full leather Armour
 
Weapon: Wooden Sword
               (Unbreaking 3)

Effect: Speed 1 or 2??
______________________________________________________________________________________________
Fisherman: Bring this one back the undertow is useful for a great attack but removed :(

Armour: Full leather Armour.

Weapon:                 Fishing Rod,          Stone Sword
    ( That pulls any players then brings back to the coor.)
Effect: None
________________________________________________________________________________________________
Armourer: The name is the armour wearer (Note the name was Heavy but removed)

Armour: Iron Helmet, Leather Chestplate, Chain Leggings, Chain Boots

Weapon: Stone Sword

Effect: None
____________________________________________________________________________________________
Archer: Ok really the kit called Ranger is not much useful ever
Armour: Full leather Armour

Weapon: Bow, wooden Sword, Arrows (48)

Effect: None 
_________________________________________________________________________________________________  
  
Assassion: This kit got nothing but splash why!? Changed this into Scout intead

 Armour: Full leather Armour
 
Weapon: Wooden Sword
               (Unbreaking 3)

Effect: Speed 1 or 2??
____________________________________________________________________________________________
Fisherman: Bring this one back the undertow is useful for a great attack but removed :(

Armour: Full leather Armour.

Weapon:                 Fishing Rod,          Stone Sword
    ( That pulls any players then brings back to the coor.)
Effect: None
________________________________________________________________________________________
Armourer: The name is the armour wearer (Note the name was Heavy but removed)

Armour: Iron Helmet, Leather Chestplate, Chain Leggings, Chain Boots

Weapon: Stone Sword

Effect: None
__________________________________________________________________________________________________---
Archer: Ok really calling the ranger sounds like an elite archer but shot can be missed!

Armour: Full leather Armour

Weapon:             Bow,          wooden Sword, Arrows (48)
                (Power 1,Punch1) (Unbreaking 3)
Effect: None
 ________________________________________________________________________________________________

 Sniper: Look the same but the shots are way even powerful 
 
Armour: Full Leather Armour
 
Weapon: Bow,       Wooden Sword, Arrows (32) 
            (Power 2)  (Unbreaking 3) 
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
 
Medic: Why look same as Mage but the healing are more powerful as ever!
 
Armour: Golden Helmet, Golden Chestplate, Leather Leggings, Golden Boots
           (Unbreaking 3)    (Unbreaking 3)                                      (Unbreaking 3)
 Weapon: Golden Sword, Splash Potion of Healing 2 (6), Splash Potion of Regenaration 2 (3)
           (Unbreaking 3)                          
 Effect: None 
________________________________________________________________________________________________

title: CTH Kits ideas and changes (Unofficial)

replies.body: Props to the amount of effort you went through making this post but you should know by now they don't care about Cth anymore considering fast hit is still a thing and the kit update where they get rid of any kits that can survive the demo the most broken kit ever .-.
replies.body_tagged: Props to the amount of effort you went through making this post but you should know by now they don't care about Cth anymore considering fast hit is still a thing and the kit update where they get rid of any kits that can survive the demo the most broken kit ever .-.

replies.body:
Lel Demoman is OP but, I haven't found anything that can be immune but exepct there is enchantment called 
Blast Protection but still unless they enchanted the boot (Feather Falling) Lel
